abstract: Baseball Roundup; Pittsburgh Pirates defeat St Louis Cardinals, 4-1; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Liriano drove home the first run of the 2016 Major League Baseball season, sending Pittsburgh Pirates past the St. Louis Cardinals, 4-1, on Sunday.

headline.main: Francisco Liriano Lifts Pirates at the Mound and the Plate
headline.print_headline: Liriano Lifts the Pirates at the Mound and the Plate

snippet: Liriano drove home the first run of the 2016 Major League Baseball season, sending Pittsburgh Pirates past the St. Louis Cardinals, 4-1, on Sunday.
